page.title: 12Southliegh Forest (owners)
page.content: The ownership of Southleigh Forest is at present divided up as follows:- 100 acres owned by Mays Coppice Farm. The area west of Woodberry Lane, across the County Boundary, halfway to Comley Hill owned by Portsmouth Water Company, who purchased it in order to construct a reservoir / water sports area.(It is now intended that this will be built at Havant Thicket.) The remaining triangle is still owned by Sir Lynton White, together with land across the Horndean Road westwards to the railway line with the exeption of the site occupied by the B.U.P.A Hospital.
